description: A momentary lapse in attention causes the pilot to incorrectly select Flap FULL at a high speed, triggering an overspeed warning. All aircraft systems were functioning perfectly.

telemetry_events.description: Pilot incorrectly moves flap lever from 1 directly to FULL.

maintenance_logs.action: All flight control systems checked and found to be operating normally. Aircraft is in perfect technical condition.

transcript.speaker: FO
transcript.dialogue: Wow, what a game last night, huh?

transcript.sound: Sound of flap lever moving rapidly through multiple detents, much faster than standard procedure.

transcript.speaker: FO
transcript.dialogue: Sorry... my mistake. I was distracted for a second there.

context_data.weather: CAVOK (Ceiling and Visibility OK), light winds.
context_data.flight_phase_details: Standard approach, no time pressure from ATC.
context_data.crew_pairing_details: The Captain is known for a very relaxed, hands-off approach to supervision, especially with new First Officers. The FO recently completed line training.
